title: Thunder bird 115.4.3 not reporting correct number of unread emails.
content: Thunderbird 115.4.3 is not reporting the correct number of unread emails. Sometimes it says there is 1 unread and I waste time looking for it and there doe not seem to be any unread. Other times it reports 10 unread and when I read one of them it still indicates 10 are unread.

title: Moving Thunderbird to New PC
content: The hard drive on my PC running Windows 10 crashed and I have a new one running Windows 11. I used Thunderbird on the old PC and am trying to set up Thunderbird on the new PC. My email account is with AOL. When setting up Thunderbird on the new PC, it asks for the password. I am trying to use the AOL password but it does not work. The same password works on other devices. I have no access to the data on the old hard drive. Any suggestions greatly appreciated.
creator: wmattiace

title: Problems with pulseaudio
content: Since years I've a reliable running configuration (Ubuntu 22.04 LTS up to date). I#m using MPD in user mode to listen radio streams. Since the last update of Thunderbird (115.4.1 64-Bit) the start of thunderbird crashes pulseaudio. Everytime Thunderbird is started there is an ugly sound from speaker and the running radio stream is interrupted. Here are the log lines from MPD player from that event: ``` Nov 19 10:22 : output: Failed to play on "Pulse-Audio" (pulse): disconnected Nov 19 10:22 : exception: Failed to open audio output ``` I've to choose my station again, then MPD will play again program. But I guess it is not a MPD issue at least but something between Thunderbird and Pulseaudio is wrong. Does anybody has an idea whrer to serch or which logs could tell more?
creator: joerg.zywek

title: Thunderbid: How to copy an adress book ?
content:

I am on Thunderbird 115.4.1
